## ShaderFramework.getCameraPosition() method

Gets the uniform variable of type vec3 which holds the camera position

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getCameraPosition(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The camera position
